name: Examinations
text:
[§435C-10]  Examinations.  The insurance commissioner shall make an examination into the affairs of the plan at least annually.  Such examination shall be conducted and the report thereon filed in the manner prescribed in section 431:2-302.  The expenses of every such examination shall be borne and paid by the plan in the manner prescribed by section 431:2-306. [L 1975, c 161, pt of §1]
 
Revision Note
 
  Sections 431:2-302 and 431:2-306 substituted for sections 431-54 and 431-59, respectively.
